config.label: Content
config.name: content
config.helpText: Enter the HTML content you want to display in the component.

config.label: Button
config.name: button
config.helpText: If defined, the button will be displayed next to the previous content.

content.label: Href
content.name: href
content.helpText: If defined, a button link will be displayed next to the previous content and when clicked will redirect to the URL defined in this field.

content.label: Title
content.name: title
content.helpText: Title attribute of the previous link.

content.label: Text
content.name: text
content.helpText: Text to be displayed inside the button.
